title: The Asset Allocator: Patience Is An Investing Virtue
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: A UBS survey of 3,400 clients shows the ultra-wealthy group moving into cash, with these investors “fearing” or “bracing for” a major market sell-off. But if you look behind the headlines at their actions and views, these are not fearful but rather patient investors. This podcast (5:31) argues that patience is action based on a thoughtful consideration of investment reality – the reality that the masses buy high and sell low, such that these wealthy investors are preparing to do the opposite. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
